name: HANGAME GO
description:
Global release of HANGAME GO!

Built with systems like estimation, Hint, AI match that can challenge AlphaGo and DeepZenGo!

​
***** The war of stars! Watch pro live match & bet! *****

Fierce big matches of national/international Pro tournament!
Watch the games in live
and enjoy the exciting bet.


***** 9x9 Master's Weekly League & lots of rewards! *****

50 billion worth GOLD is awarded to 50,000 high rankers every Monday moring. The ranking is calculated by 9x9 rating games.


***** Relay of missions every day! Match & Bet missions *****

Experience a fierce victory and enjoy great benefits!
Fun missions and rewards will be given to you every day.
Complete the missions for the day and get GOLD in return.
(* A day is based on KST.)


■ Privacy statement : https://tid.toast.com/toastPrivacyTermAgreeGlobal.nhn
